alert.note: Alert for Coshocton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 7:40AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL AFFECT GUERNSEY...COSHOCTON...MUSKINGUM... NORTHWESTERN CARROLL...TUSCARAWAS AND WESTERN NOBLE COUNTIES... At 739 AM EST, radar indicated gusty showers were located along a line extending from near Holmesville to near Lake Hope State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. Wind gusts up to 45 mph are possible with these showers. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, New Philadelphia, Dover, Coshocton, Cambridge, Uhrichsville, Newcomerstown, Dennison, Strasburg, New Concord, Byesville, and West Lafayette. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 145 and 187. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 27 and 95. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
